comments.body: According to the [ latency result](https://software.intel.com/sites/landingpage/IntrinsicsGuide/#text=_mm_cvtsd_f64&expand=2817,2817,2817,2817,1874,618,1706,5609,6042,5606,5609,1788&techs=MMX,SSE,SSE2,AVX),  `_mm_cvtsd_f64 `cost less than `_mm_storel_pd`.
both have the same latency, plus ` _mm_cvtsd_f64` requires dereferencing.
